We ordered the Churro's and Chocolate.  The Churro's were still hot when they came out.  SOO GOOD!  I also ordered a chocolate milk shake.  I took a little sip.  It was like chocolate heaven.  Then a few seconds later I look down and it was gone.  I could have drank a gallon of it.  My family and I just laughed and laughed about the chocolate milk shake disappearing.  So obviously, I think you should order a chocolate milk shake!
